alert.note: Alert for Louisa; Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 9:16PM CST until December 15 at 11:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CST FOR LOUISA...CEDAR AND MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 915 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Wyoming to Mediapolis, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Muscatine, Tipton, West Branch, Wapello, Columbus Junction, Durant, Mechanicsville, Stanwood, West Liberty, Wilton, Walcott, Fruitland, Morning Sun, Lowden, New Boston, Grandview, Conesville, Bennett, Columbus City and Letts. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern Illinois...and southeastern and east central Iowa.
